MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the TD11 area of Duns. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 6:31am. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of the extent of repairs required to our underground electricity network near Langtongate and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3:30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:45am on Saturday, 06 February 2021
